events.message: I received my order two days ago, but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I am not satisfied with it.
The issue is categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to dissatisfaction.
Agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer moving forward.
Hello, this is Maria from customer support. I am here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide the order number?
To process your refund, could you please confirm if the product is unopened and if you still have the order invoice?
Yes, I still have the unopened product and the original invoice with me. My order number is 987654321.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund process immediately. Please allow 5-7 business days for the amount to reflect back in your account.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out anytime.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience to help us improve our services.
